main.gui_interface

Interface IOrganizerMessageUI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrganizerMessageUI

    public interface IOrganizerMessageUI
extends IView
    The OrganizerMessageUIPresenter will depend on this interface which is implemented by OrganizerMessageUI
    Author:
    Yi Tao Li
